pros: A lot of gossip over lunch where only one guy speaks. Sometimes gossip also extends after your office hours where you will have to listen to his personal and other adventures.
cons: Extremely explosive and shrewd person. He will confiscate your passport, Aadhar, Driving license and other educational documents (original) and then ask for money in liew of these docuemnts. There have been several police complaints against him and he was in lock up for a few nights after several people complained about his behaviour. A megalomaniac who just wants you to work for him for 12 hours, and you have to say to every thing he says. He will call you on sundays and saturdays too, will force you to work for longer hours, pat your thighs if you are female, and tell you about his sad, lonely life.
